Recipes.name: Chicken Tikka
Recipes.overview: Grilled or roasted marinated chicken with flavorful spices.
ingredients: 1.5 lbs boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, garam masala, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric, cayenne pepper, and salt.
Add chicken pieces to the marinade, ensuring they are well-coated. Marinate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Preheat grill or oven. Thread marinated chicken onto skewers.
Grill or roast until the chicken is fully cooked and has a nice char, about 15-20 minutes.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

Recipes.name: Butter Chicken
Recipes.overview: Creamy and rich tomato-based curry with tender chicken pieces.
ingredients: 1.5 lbs boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
instructions: In a bowl, marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, garam masala, cumin powder, coriander powder, chili powder, and salt. Let it marinate for at least 1 hour.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté chopped onions until golden brown.
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned. Add tomato puree and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream and fenugreek leaves. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

Recipes.name: Chicken Shawarma
Recipes.overview: Marinated and grilled chicken, typically served in a flatbread wrap.
ingredients: 1.5 lbs boneless, skinless chicken thighs, thinly sliced
instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, olive oil, minced garlic, cumin powder, coriander powder, paprika, turmeric, cayenne pepper, lemon juice, and salt.
Add thinly sliced chicken to the marinade, ensuring it is well-coated. Marinate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Preheat grill or skillet. Cook marinated chicken until fully cooked and slightly charred.
Warm flatbreads or pita. Fill with grilled chicken, diced tomatoes, sliced onions, and drizzle with tzatziki sauce.
Roll into wraps and serve hot.

Recipes.name: Chicken Parmesan
Recipes.overview: Breaded and baked chicken topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, combine breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning.
Dip each chicken breast in beaten eggs, then coat with the breadcrumb mixture.
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat. Brown chicken on both sides.
Pour marinara sauce over the chicken and sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top.
Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Serve hot, optionally over pasta or with a side of vegetables.

Recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Roast Chicken
Recipes.overview: A roasted chicken with a zesty lemon and garlic marinade.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Pat the chicken dry and season with salt and black pepper.
In a bowl, mix minced garlic, chopped rosemary, and olive oil. Rub this mixture over the chicken.
Place lemon slices under and over the chicken.
Roast in the preheated oven for 1 to 1.5 hours or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving.
Serve with roasted vegetables or your favorite side dishes.

Recipes.name: Honey Mustard Glazed Chicken
Recipes.overview: Grilled or baked chicken coated in a sweet and tangy honey mustard glaze.
instructions: Preheat grill or oven to medium-high heat.
In a bowl, whisk together Dijon mustard, honey, soy sauce, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Brush the honey mustard glaze over the chicken thighs.
Grill or bake the chicken for about 25-30 minutes, turning and basting with the glaze halfway through.
Ensure the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
Serve hot with your favorite sides.

Recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
Recipes.overview: Grilled chicken served over creamy Alfredo sauce and pasta.
instructions: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions.
Season chicken breasts with salt and black pepper, then grill or pan-cook until fully cooked.
In a saucepan, melt butter, add minced garlic, and sauté until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper. Stir until the sauce thickens.
Slice grilled chicken and place it over cooked fettuccine. Pour Alfredo sauce over the top.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve hot.

Recipes.name: Teriyaki Chicken Stir Fry
Recipes.overview: Chicken stir-fried with vegetables in a flavorful teriyaki sauce.
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken thighs, sliced
instructions: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, hoisin sauce, sesame oil, brown sugar, minced garlic, grated ginger, and cornstarch.
Heat a wok or skillet over high heat. Add chicken and stir-fry until browned and cooked through.
Add vegetables and continue to stir-fry until they are tender-crisp.
Pour the teriyaki sauce over the chicken and vegetables. Stir until the sauce thickens.
Garnish with sesame seeds and serve over rice or noodles.

Recipes.name: Buffalo Chicken Wraps
Recipes.overview: Spicy buffalo chicken, lettuce, and ranch dressing wrapped in a tortilla.
instructions: In a bowl, mix shredded chicken with buffalo sauce until well coated.
Warm the flour tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
Divide the buffalo chicken among the tortillas. Top with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, and drizzle with ranch dressing.
Optional: Sprinkle crumbled blue cheese over the top.
Fold in the sides of each tortilla and roll them up into wraps.
Serve immediately and enjoy the spicy goodness!

Recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
Recipes.overview: Creamy and rich tomato-based curry with cubes of paneer.
instructions: In a blender, grind soaked cashews into a smooth paste.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté chopped onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté until the raw smell disappears.
Add tomato puree, cashew paste, garam masala, cumin powder, coriander powder, chili powder, and salt. Cook until the oil separates.
Add cubed paneer and cook for a few minutes until the paneer is heated through.
Stir in heavy cream and kasuri methi. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with naan or rice.

Recipes.name: Palak Paneer
Recipes.overview: Paneer cubes cooked in a creamy spinach (palak) gravy.
ingredients: 2 cups fresh spinach, blanched and pureed
instructions: In a pan, heat ghee and add cumin seeds. Once they splutter, add thinly sliced onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add grated ginger, minced garlic, and chopped green chilies. Sauté until the raw smell disappears.
Add finely chopped tomatoes and cook until they are soft and the oil separates.
Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well.
Add blanched and pureed spinach. Mix well and let it simmer for 10 minutes.
Add cubed paneer and cream. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes.
Garnish with a swirl of cream and serve hot with roti or rice.

Recipes.name: Kadai Paneer
Recipes.overview: Spicy and flavorful paneer stir-fry with bell peppers and onions.
ingredients: 1 each of red, green, and yellow bell peppers, sliced
instructions: In a pan, heat oil and sauté sliced onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and chopped green chilies. Sauté until the raw smell disappears.
Add finely chopped tomatoes, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, and salt. Cook until tomatoes are soft.
Add sliced bell peppers and cook until they are slightly tender but still have a crunch.
Add cubed paneer and kasuri methi. Mix well and cook for a few minutes until paneer is heated through.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with naan or roti.

Recipes.name: Paneer Tikka Masala
Recipes.overview: Grilled paneer cubes in a spiced tomato-based curry.
instructions: In a bowl, mix yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, coriander powder, cumin powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, paprika, and salt.
Add cubed paneer to the marinade, ensuring it is well-coated. Marinate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Preheat grill or skillet. Cook marinated paneer until fully cooked and slightly charred.
In a pan, melt butter. Add chopped green chilies and tomato puree. Cook until the oil separates.
Add grilled paneer, kasuri methi, and cream. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with naan or rice.

Recipes.name: Paneer Bhurji
Recipes.overview: Scrambled paneer cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
instructions: In a pan, heat oil and add cumin seeds. Once they splutter, add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add grated ginger, minced garlic, and chopped green chilies. Sauté until the raw smell disappears.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they are soft and the oil separates.
Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well.
Add crumbled paneer and kasuri methi. Cook for a few minutes until the paneer is well-incorporated with the spices.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with roti or paratha.

Recipes.name: Paneer Pakora
Recipes.overview: Paneer cubes coated in a spiced chickpea flour batter and deep-fried.
ingredients: 1/2 cup water (or as needed for batter)
instructions: In a bowl, mix chickpea flour, rice flour, turmeric powder, red chili powder, ajwain, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add water to the dry ingredients to form a smooth, thick batter.
Dip paneer cubes into the batter, ensuring they are well-coated.
Heat oil in a pan for deep frying. Fry the coated paneer cubes until golden brown and crispy.
Remove and drain excess oil on a paper towel.
Sprinkle chaat masala if desired and serve hot with mint chutney or ketchup.

Recipes.name: Paneer Pulao
Recipes.overview: Fragrant rice cooked with paneer, vegetables, and aromatic spices.
ingredients: 1 cup basmati rice, soaked and drained
instructions: In a pot, heat ghee and add cumin seeds, bay leaf, cloves, cardamom pods, and cinnamon stick.
Add thinly sliced onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add diced carrots, chopped green beans, and green peas. Sauté for a few minutes until the vegetables are slightly tender.
Add cubed paneer and soaked basmati rice. Stir well to coat the rice with the vegetables and paneer.
Add turmeric powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well.
Pour in water (usually 2 cups for 1 cup of rice) and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until the rice is cooked and water is absorbed.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with raita.

Recipes.name: Matar Paneer
Recipes.overview: Paneer and green peas cooked in a spiced tomato-based curry.
instructions: In a pan, heat oil and add chopped onions. Sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and chopped green chilies. Sauté until the raw smell disappears.
Add finely chopped tomatoes and cook until they are soft and the oil separates.
Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well.
Add green peas and cubed paneer. Cook for a few minutes until the peas are tender and paneer is heated through.
Stir in cream and kasuri methi. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with naan or rice.

Recipes.name: Paneer Chilli
Recipes.overview: Indo-Chinese fusion dish with paneer, bell peppers, and a spicy sauce.

ingredients.bellPeppers: 1 each of red, green, and yellow bell peppers, sliced

instructions: In a bowl, make a slurry by mixing cornflour with water.
Dip paneer cubes in the cornflour slurry and deep fry until golden brown. Set aside.
In a pan, heat oil and add thinly sliced onions. Sauté until they become translucent.
Add ginger-garlic paste and chopped green chilies. Sauté until the raw smell disappears.
Add sliced bell peppers and cook until they are slightly tender but still have a crunch.
Add soy sauce, chili garlic sauce, and tomato ketchup. Mix well.
Add fried paneer cubes and toss until the paneer is well-coated with the sauce.
Garnish with chopped spring onions and serve hot as an appetizer or with fried rice.

Recipes.name: Paneer Kofta
Recipes.overview: Deep-fried paneer balls in a rich and creamy tomato-based curry.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix crumbled paneer, mashed potatoes, chopped onions, ginger-garlic paste, chopped green chilies, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala, and salt.
Shape the mixture into small balls and deep fry until golden brown. Set aside.
In a pan, heat oil and add chopped onions. Sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook until the raw smell disappears.
Add tomato puree, soaked cashews, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala, and salt. Cook until the oil separates.
Stir in heavy cream and kasuri methi. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes.
Add the fried paneer balls to the curry and coat them with the sauce.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with naan or rice.

Recipes.name: Paneer Biryani
Recipes.overview: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with paneer and aromatic spices.

ingredients.basmatiRice: 1 cup basmati rice, soaked and drained
ingredients.mintLeaves: A handful of mint leaves, chopped
ingredients.corianderLeaves: A handful of coriander leaves, chopped
ingredients.saffron: A pinch of saffron strands soaked in warm milk

instructions: In a pot, heat ghee and oil. Add bay leaf, cloves, cardamom pods, and cinnamon stick.
Add thinly sliced onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add chopped tomatoes, ginger-garlic paste, chopped green chilies, biryani masala, and salt. Cook until the tomatoes are soft.
Add cubed paneer and cook for a few minutes until the paneer is heated through.
In a separate pot, parboil basmati rice with salt. Drain the rice when it is 70% cooked.
In a layering fashion, assemble the biryani. Place a layer of partially cooked rice over the paneer mixture.
Sprinkle chopped mint leaves and coriander leaves. Drizzle saffron-infused milk over the rice.
Cover and cook on low heat until the rice is fully cooked and aromatic.
Garnish with fried onions and serve hot with raita.

Recipes.name: Gulab Jamun
Recipes.overview: Soft and spongy milk-based dumplings soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup.

ingredients.milk: 2 tablespoons milk (as needed to form a smooth dough)

instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine khoya, grated paneer, all-purpose flour, cardamom powder, and ghee.
Add milk gradually and knead the mixture into a smooth dough.
Divide the dough into small portions and shape them into round balls.
In a separate pan, combine sugar and water to make the sugar syrup. Add rose water and simmer until it reaches a one-string consistency.
Heat oil in a deep pan and deep fry the dough balls until golden brown.
Soak the fried balls in the sugar syrup for a few hours until they absorb the syrup.
Gulab Jamun is ready to be served!

Recipes.name: Rasgulla
Recipes.overview: Light and spongy cottage cheese balls soaked in sugar syrup.
instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine grated paneer, semolina, and cardamom powder. Knead into a smooth dough.
Divide the dough into small portions and shape them into round balls.
In a separate pot, combine sugar and water. Bring it to a boil to make the sugar syrup. Add rose water and saffron strands.
Add the paneer balls to the boiling sugar syrup and cook covered for 15-20 minutes until they become spongy.
Allow the Rasgullas to cool and garnish with chopped pistachios.
Chill before serving.

Recipes.name: Jalebi
Recipes.overview: Deep-fried pretzel-shaped batter soaked in saffron-flavored sugar syrup.
instructions: In a bowl, mix all-purpose flour, yogurt, and baking powder to make a thick batter. Allow it to ferment for a few hours or overnight.
In a separate pan, combine sugar and water to make the sugar syrup. Add saffron strands and cardamom powder. Bring it to a boil and then simmer until it reaches a one-string consistency.
Heat oil in a pan for deep frying.
Pour the batter into a squeeze bottle or piping bag. Squeeze the batter into hot oil in a pretzel shape.
Fry until the Jalebis are golden brown and crisp. Remove and immediately dip them into the sugar syrup.
Allow them to soak for a few minutes, and then serve warm.

Recipes.name: Kheer
Recipes.overview: Creamy rice pudding made with milk, rice, and flavored with cardamom.
instructions: Wash the basmati rice and soak it in water for 30 minutes.
In a heavy-bottomed pan, heat ghee and add the soaked rice. Sauté for a few minutes until the rice turns golden.
Add milk to the rice and bring it to a boil. Simmer and cook until the rice is soft and the milk thickens.
Add sugar, cardamom powder, chopped almonds, pistachios, raisins, and saffron strands. Mix well and cook for an additional 10 minutes.
Remove from heat and let it cool. Kheer thickens as it cools.
Serve chilled, garnished with chopped nuts.

Recipes.name: Malpua
Recipes.overview: Deep-fried sweet pancakes served with rabri or sugar syrup.
instructions: In a bowl, mix all-purpose flour, milk powder, and fennel seeds. Gradually add milk to make a smooth batter.
Heat ghee in a pan. Pour a ladleful of batter into the hot ghee to make a small pancake (malpua). Fry until golden brown on both sides.
In a separate pan, combine sugar and water to make a sugar syrup. Add cardamom powder and simmer until it reaches a one-string consistency.
Dip the fried malpuas into the sugar syrup, ensuring they are well-coated.
Serve malpuas garnished with chopped pistachios.
Enjoy these sweet pancakes with rabri or as is.

Recipes.name: Tiramisu
Recipes.overview: Layered coffee-flavored Italian dessert made with ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.
instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine mascarpone cheese and sugar. Mix until smooth and well combined.
In a separate bowl, whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Gently fold the whipped cream into the mascarpone mixture until smooth and creamy.
Dip each ladyfinger into the brewed espresso and layer them in the bottom of a serving dish.
Spread half of the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers layer.
Repeat the process with another layer of dipped ladyfingers and the remaining mascarpone mixture.
Sift cocoa powder over the top layer and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
Slice and serve chilled. Tiramisu is ready to be enjoyed!

Recipes.name: Creme Brulee
Recipes.overview: Classic French dessert with a rich custard base and a caramelized sugar top.

ingredients.vanillaBean: 1 vanilla bean, split and seeds scraped

instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F (163°C). Place ramekins in a baking dish and set aside.
In a saucepan, heat heavy cream and vanilla bean (including the scraped seeds) until it just begins to boil. Remove from heat and let it steep for 15 minutes.
In a bowl, whisk together egg yolks and sugar until well combined.
Slowly pour the warm cream mixture over the egg yolk mixture, whisking constantly to prevent curdling.
Strain the custard through a fine-mesh sieve into a pouring jug.
Pour the custard into the ramekins. Fill the baking dish with hot water to create a water bath.
Bake in the preheated oven for 40-45 minutes or until the custard is set but still slightly jiggly in the center.
Remove from the water bath and let it cool. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Sprinkle a thin, even layer of brown sugar over the custard and caramelize using a kitchen torch.
Serve immediately and enjoy the creamy goodness of Creme Brulee!

Recipes.name: Churros
Recipes.overview: Fried dough pastries dusted with cinnamon sugar, often served with chocolate sauce.
instructions: In a saucepan, combine water, butter, and sugar. Bring it to a boil.
Reduce heat and add all-purpose flour. Stir vigorously until the mixture forms a smooth ball.
Remove from heat and let it cool for a few minutes. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Stir in vanilla extract. Transfer the dough to a piping bag with a star tip.
Heat oil in a pan for frying. Pipe the dough into hot oil, cutting it with scissors or a knife to your desired length.
Fry until golden brown and crispy. Drain on paper towels.
In a bowl, mix sugar and ground cinnamon. Roll the fried churros in the cinnamon sugar mixture.
Serve warm with chocolate sauce for dipping.

Recipes.name: Baklava
Recipes.overview: Layered phyllo pastry filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with honey or syrup.

ingredients.nuts: 2 cups mixed nuts (walnuts, pistachios, almonds), chopped

instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F (163°C). Grease a baking dish and set aside.
In a bowl, mix chopped nuts, sugar, and ground cinnamon. Set aside.
Place one sheet of phyllo dough in the prepared baking dish and brush with melted butter. Repeat with several more sheets of phyllo dough.
Spread a portion of the nut mixture over the phyllo layers. Repeat the process, layering phyllo and nuts, until all the nut mixture is used.
Finish with a final layer of phyllo dough, brushing each sheet with butter.
Using a sharp knife, cut the baklava into diamond or square shapes before baking.
Bake in the preheated oven for 45-50 minutes or until golden brown.
While the baklava is baking, combine honey, water, and lemon juice in a saucepan. Bring to a boil and then simmer for 10 minutes.
Once baked, pour the hot syrup over the hot baklava. Allow it to cool and absorb the syrup before serving.

Recipes.name: Mango Sticky Rice
Recipes.overview: Sweet and creamy dessert featuring sticky rice topped with ripe mango slices.

ingredients.stickyRice: 1 cup glutinous rice, soaked for at least 6 hours or overnight
ingredients.mangoes: 2 ripe mangoes, peeled, pitted, and sliced

instructions: Rinse the soaked glutinous rice and steam it until fully cooked.
In a saucepan, heat coconut milk, sugar, and salt. Stir until the sugar dissolves.
Transfer the cooked sticky rice to a bowl and pour half of the coconut milk mixture over it. Allow it to soak for 30 minutes.
Slice the ripe mangoes.
Serve the sticky rice topped with mango slices. Drizzle the remaining coconut milk mixture over the top.
Garnish with toasted sesame seeds and enjoy this delightful Thai dessert!

Recipes.name: Mashed Potatoes
Recipes.overview: Creamy mashed potatoes made with butter and milk.
instructions: Boil the diced potatoes in salted water until tender. Drain and return them to the pot.
Add butter, milk, salt, and black pepper to the potatoes.
Mash the potatoes until smooth and creamy.
Adjust the seasoning to taste and garnish with chopped chives.
Serve the mashed potatoes hot as a delicious side dish.

Recipes.name: Roasted Garlic Potatoes
Recipes.overview: Oven-roasted potatoes with a flavorful garlic coating.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
In a bowl, toss halved baby potatoes with olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, thyme, salt, and black pepper.
Spread the potatoes on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes or until the potatoes are golden and crispy.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve as a delightful side dish.

Recipes.name: Potato Leek Soup
Recipes.overview: Creamy soup made with potatoes, leeks, and broth.
instructions: In a pot, sauté diced potatoes, sliced leeks, diced onion, and minced garlic until softened.
Add chicken broth, bay leaf, and thyme. Bring to a boil and then simmer until potatoes are fully cooked.
Remove the bay leaf and blend the soup until smooth using an immersion blender.
Stir in heavy cream, salt, and black pepper. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes.
Adjust seasoning to taste and garnish with chopped chives.
Serve the creamy potato leek soup hot.

Recipes.name: Hasselback Potatoes
Recipes.overview: Baked potatoes with sliced edges, creating a crispy and accordion-like texture.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Slice each scrubbed potato thinly, leaving the bottom intact to create a fan-like appearance.
In a bowl, mix melted butter, olive oil, minced garlic, chopped rosemary, salt, and black pepper.
Brush the potatoes with the butter mixture, making sure to get in between the slices.
Bake in the preheated oven for 50-60 minutes or until the edges are crispy and the inside is tender.
Sprinkle grated parmesan cheese over the top and bake for an additional 5 minutes until melted and golden.
Garnish with chopped chives and serve the hasselback potatoes hot.

Recipes.name: Potato Gnocchi
Recipes.overview: Soft potato dumplings served with your favorite sauce.

ingredients.potatoes: 2 pounds russet potatoes, baked and mashed

instructions: Bake and mash the russet potatoes. Allow them to cool slightly.
In a large bowl, combine mashed potatoes, beaten egg, all-purpose flour, salt, and ground nutmeg.
Knead the mixture until a dough forms. Divide the dough into smaller portions.
Roll each portion into a long rope and cut into bite-sized pieces to form the gnocchi.
Boil the gnocchi in salted water until they float to the surface. Remove and drain.
In a pan, melt butter and add fresh sage leaves. Sauté until the butter is golden brown.
Add the boiled gnocchi to the pan and toss until coated in the sage-infused butter.
Serve the potato gnocchi hot with grated parmesan cheese on top.

Recipes.name: Classic Scrambled Eggs
Recipes.overview: Soft and fluffy scrambled eggs seasoned to perfection.
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and black pepper until well combined.
Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat until melted and foamy.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and let it sit undisturbed for a moment. Stir occasionally until the eggs are soft and slightly creamy.
Adjust seasoning to taste and garnish with chopped chives.
Serve the classic scrambled eggs hot for a delicious and quick breakfast.

Recipes.name: Egg Salad Sandwich
Recipes.overview: Creamy egg salad served between slices of bread.

ingredients.bread: Slices of bread for making sandwiches

instructions: In a bowl, combine chopped hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, green onions, celery, salt, and black pepper.
Mix until well combined and creamy.
Spread the egg salad onto slices of bread and top with lettuce leaves to make sandwiches.
Serve the egg salad sandwiches chilled for a delightful lunch or snack.

Recipes.name: Spanish Tortilla (Tortilla Española)
Recipes.overview: Classic Spanish omelette made with eggs, potatoes, and onions.

ingredients.potatoes: 2 large potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced

instructions: Heat olive oil in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Add sliced potatoes and onions, and cook until potatoes are tender but not browned.
In a bowl, beat eggs and season with salt and black pepper.
Add the cooked potatoes and onions to the beaten eggs and mix well.
Heat a little more olive oil in the skillet. Pour the egg and potato mixture into the skillet and spread it evenly.
Cook on low heat until the edges are set, then carefully flip the tortilla to cook the other side until fully set.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve the Spanish tortilla warm or at room temperature.

Recipes.name: Egg Fried Rice
Recipes.overview: Stir-fried rice with vegetables, protein, and scrambled eggs.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and grated ginger, stir-fry for a minute until fragrant.
Add mixed vegetables and cook until slightly tender. Push the vegetables to one side of the wok.
Pour beaten eggs into the other side of the wok and scramble until just set.
Combine the scrambled eggs with the vegetables. Add cooked rice, soy sauce, salt, and black pepper. Stir-fry until well combined and heated through.
Garnish with chopped green onions and serve the egg fried rice hot as a main dish or side.

Recipes.name: Eggs Benedict
Recipes.overview: Poached eggs served on English muffins with Canadian bacon and hollandaise sauce.
instructions: Prepare hollandaise sauce and keep it warm.

Poach the eggs: Bring a pot of water to a simmer. Add a splash of vinegar. Crack each egg into a small bowl and gently slide it into the simmering water. Poach for 3-4 minutes until the whites are set but the yolks are still runny.
Remove poached eggs with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels.
Assemble the Eggs Benedict: Place toasted English muffin halves on a plate. Top each half with a slice of Canadian bacon, a poached egg, and a generous spoonful of hollandaise sauce.
Garnish with chopped chives and serve the Eggs Benedict immediately.

Recipes.name: Tomato Basil Pasta
Recipes.overview: Classic pasta dish with a flavorful tomato and basil sauce.
instructions: Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add diced tomatoes, salt, and black pepper. Cook until the tomatoes break down and release their juices.
Stir in chopped fresh basil and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Toss the cooked pasta in the tomato and basil sauce until well coated.
Serve the tomato basil pasta hot, garnished with grated parmesan cheese.

Recipes.name: Caprese Salad
Recipes.overview: Refreshing salad with tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a serving platter.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
In a small bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
Drizzle the dressing over the Caprese salad just before serving.
Serve the Caprese salad as a light and flavorful appetizer or side dish.

Recipes.name: Tomato Soup
Recipes.overview: Comforting and creamy tomato soup.
instructions: In a pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped onion, carrot, celery, and garlic. Sauté until vegetables are softened.
Add chopped tomatoes, tomato paste, vegetable broth, salt, and black pepper. Bring to a boil and then simmer for 20-25 minutes.
Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth.
Stir in heavy cream and fresh basil. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes.
Adjust seasoning to taste and serve the creamy tomato soup hot.

Recipes.name: Bruschetta
Recipes.overview: Toasted bread with a topping of diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Place baguette slices on a baking sheet and toast in the oven until golden brown.
In a bowl, combine diced tomatoes, minced garlic, chopped fresh basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and black pepper.
Spoon the tomato mixture over the toasted baguette slices.
Serve the bruschetta as a tasty appetizer or snack.

Recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
Recipes.overview: Hearty pasta dish with a rich tomato and meat sauce.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a pan, brown the ground beef over medium heat. Add chopped onion and minced garlic, sauté until softened.
Stir in tomato paste, tomato sauce, red wine, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and black pepper.
Simmer the sauce for 15-20 minutes until it thickens and the flavors meld together.
Serve the Bolognese sauce over the cooked spaghetti, and sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese.

Recipes.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
Recipes.overview: Juicy shrimp cooked in a flavorful garlic butter sauce.

ingredients.shrimp: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined

instructions: In a pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add shrimp to the pan and cook until they turn pink, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Stir in lemon juice, chopped parsley, red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper.
Cook for an additional 2 minutes until the flavors meld together.
Serve the garlic butter shrimp hot, with crusty bread for dipping.

Recipes.name: Garlic Roasted Vegetables
Recipes.overview: Assorted vegetables roasted to perfection with garlic and herbs.

ingredients.vegetables: 4 cups assorted vegetables (e.g., carrots, broccoli, bell peppers), chopped

instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
In a bowl, toss chopped vegetables with olive oil, minced garlic, chopped rosemary, chopped thyme, salt, and black pepper.
Spread the vegetables on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until the vegetables are golden and tender.
Serve the garlic roasted vegetables as a delicious and healthy side dish.

Recipes.name: Garlic Herb Chicken
Recipes.overview: Succulent chicken breasts marinated with garlic and aromatic herbs.
instructions: In a bowl, mix olive oil, minced garlic, chopped rosemary, chopped thyme, lemon zest, salt, and black pepper to create the marinade.
Place chicken breasts in a resealable plastic bag and pour the marinade over them. Seal the bag and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat.
Grill the marinated chicken breasts for 6-7 minutes per side or until cooked through.
Serve the garlic herb chicken hot, garnished with additional fresh herbs.

Recipes.name: Garlic Parmesan Pasta
Recipes.overview: Creamy pasta with a garlic-infused Parmesan cheese sauce.
instructions: Cook the pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Pour in heavy cream and bring it to a simmer. Stir in grated Parmesan cheese until the sauce is smooth.
Season the sauce with salt and black pepper. Add the cooked pasta and toss until well coated.
Garnish the garlic Parmesan pasta with chopped fresh parsley before serving.

Recipes.name: Garlic Bread
Recipes.overview: Crusty bread slices slathered with garlic-infused butter.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, mix softened butter, minced garlic, chopped parsley, salt, and black pepper to create the garlic butter.
Spread the garlic butter generously over each baguette slice.
Place the slices on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes or until the edges are golden and crispy.
Serve the garlic bread warm as a perfect accompaniment to your favorite meal.

Recipes.name: French Onion Soup
Recipes.overview: Rich and savory soup with caramelized onions and melted cheese.
instructions: In a large pot, melt butter over medium heat. Add thinly sliced onions and cook until caramelized, about 20-25 minutes.
Pour in red wine to deglaze the pot, scraping up any browned bits from the bottom.
Add beef broth, fresh thyme leaves, salt, and black pepper. Bring to a simmer and let it cook for an additional 15-20 minutes.
Preheat the broiler. Ladle the soup into oven-safe bowls. Top each bowl with slices of baguette and a generous amount of grated Gruyere cheese.
Place the bowls under the broiler until the cheese is melted and golden brown.
Serve the French onion soup hot, with the cheesy top creating a delicious crust.

Recipes.name: Caramelized Onion Tart
Recipes.overview: Flaky pastry crust topped with sweet and savory caramelized onions.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Roll out the puff pastry sheet on a lightly floured surface and transfer it to a baking sheet.
In a pan, heat butter and olive oil over medium heat. Add thinly sliced onions and cook until caramelized, about 20 minutes.
Spread the caramelized onions over the puff pastry. Sprinkle with fresh thyme leaves, crumbled goat cheese, salt, and black pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes or until the pastry is golden brown and puffed.
Drizzle with balsamic reduction before serving the caramelized onion tart warm.

Recipes.name: Onion Rings
Recipes.overview: Crispy and golden-fried onion rings with a seasoned coating.
instructions: Soak onion rings in buttermilk for at least 30 minutes.
In a bowl, combine all-purpose flour, cornmeal, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper to create the coating mixture.
Heat vegetable oil in a deep fryer or large pan to 350°F (175°C).
Dredge each soaked onion ring in the coating mixture, ensuring they are well coated.
Fry the coated onion rings in batches until they are golden brown and crispy, about 2-3 minutes per batch.
Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels. Serve the crispy onion rings hot.

Recipes.name: Bloomin' Onion
Recipes.overview: A deep-fried whole onion with a seasoned coating, resembling a blooming flower.

ingredients.dippingSauce: 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons ketchup, 1 tablespoon horseradish, 1/2 teaspoon paprika

instructions: Cut the top off the onion and peel the skin, leaving the root intact. Cut the onion into wedges, stopping about 1/2 inch from the root end to keep the layers connected.
Soak the onion in buttermilk for at least 30 minutes.
In a bowl, combine all-purpose flour, paprika, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper to create the coating mixture.
Dredge the soaked onion in the coating mixture, making sure to get the mixture between the layers.
Heat vegetable oil in a deep fryer or large pot to 350°F (175°C). Carefully lower the coated onion into the hot oil and fry for 3-4 minutes or until golden brown and crispy.
Combine mayonnaise, ketchup, horseradish, and paprika to create the dipping sauce.
Serve the bloomin' onion hot with the dipping sauce.

Recipes.name: Caramelized Onion and Goat Cheese Pizza
Recipes.overview: Delicious pizza topped with sweet caramelized onions and creamy goat cheese.
instructions: Preheat the oven to the highest temperature your oven can go, typically around 475°F (245°C).
In a pan, melt butter and olive oil over medium heat. Add thinly sliced onions and cook until caramelized, about 20 minutes.
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface and transfer it to a pizza stone or baking sheet.
Spread the caramelized onions over the pizza dough. Sprinkle crumbled goat cheese, chopped fresh rosemary, salt, and black pepper on top.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Drizzle with balsamic reduction before serving the caramelized onion and goat cheese pizza hot.

Recipes.name: Rajma Masala
Recipes.overview: A flavorful kidney bean curry with aromatic spices.
ingredients: 2 cups kidney beans (rajma), soaked and boiled
instructions: Sauté onions in oil until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomato puree, and spices. Cook until the oil separates.
Add boiled kidney beans and yogurt. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan.

Recipes.name: Spicy Rajma Curry
Recipes.overview: An extra-spicy kidney bean curry for spice lovers.
ingredients: 2 cups kidney beans (rajma), soaked and boiled
instructions: Sauté onions and green chilies in oil until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, and spices. Cook until tomatoes are soft.
Add tomato puree, yogurt, and boiled kidney beans. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot.

Recipes.name: Rajma Pulao
Recipes.overview: A one-pot rice dish with kidney beans and aromatic spices.
ingredients: 1/2 cup kidney beans (rajma), soaked and boiled
instructions: Sauté onions in oil until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, and spices. Cook until tomatoes are soft.
Add boiled kidney beans, yogurt, and soaked rice. Cook until rice is done.
Garnish with fresh mint leaves and serve hot.

Recipes.name: Rajma Salad
Recipes.overview: A refreshing and protein-packed kidney bean salad.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine boiled kidney beans, diced vegetables, and boiled corn.
Add lemon juice, chaat masala, salt, and pepper. Toss well to combine.
Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve chilled.

Recipes.name: Rajma Wrap
Recipes.overview: A tasty and nutritious wrap filled with spicy kidney beans.
instructions: Sauté onions in oil until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, and spices. Cook until tomatoes are soft.
Add boiled kidney beans and yogurt. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Warm the whole wheat wraps and fill with the rajma mixture. Roll and serve.

Recipes.name: Sattu Sherbat
Recipes.overview: A refreshing summer drink made from roasted gram flour (sattu).
instructions: Mix sattu with cold water and jaggery or sugar until well dissolved.
Add roasted cumin powder and black salt. Stir well.
Garnish with lemon slices and serve chilled.

Recipes.name: Ginger Lemon Honey Tea
Recipes.overview: A soothing and immunity-boosting tea with Nepalese flavors.
instructions: Boil water with grated ginger and turmeric powder.
Strain the tea into a cup and add honey and lemon juice.
Garnish with a cinnamon stick and enjoy.

Recipes.name: Bel Juice
Recipes.overview: A nutritious and sweet juice made from wood apple (bel).
instructions: Blend bel pulp with cold water until smooth.
Strain the mixture and add sugar and black salt. Stir well.
Garnish with mint leaves and serve chilled.

Recipes.name: Aloevera Lemonade
Recipes.overview: A refreshing and healthy lemonade with the goodness of aloe vera.
instructions: Blend aloe vera gel with cold water until well combined.
Add honey, lemon juice, and rock salt. Mix well.
Garnish with lemon slices and serve over ice.

Recipes.name: Lassi
Recipes.overview: A traditional Nepalese yogurt-based drink, sweet or salty.
ingredients: 2 tbsp sugar (for sweet lassi) or 1/2 tsp salt (for salty lassi)
instructions: Blend yogurt, cold water, and sugar or salt until smooth.
Add cardamom powder and blend again.
Serve chilled with crushed ice on top.

Recipes.name: Jamun Juice
Recipes.overview: A vibrant purple juice made from fresh jamun (black plum).
instructions: Blend deseeded jamun with cold water until smooth.
Strain the juice and add honey and black salt. Mix well.
Garnish with mint leaves and serve chilled.

Recipes.name: Timur Ko Sharbat
Recipes.overview: A unique and spicy drink made from Sichuan pepper (timur).
instructions: Mix crushed Sichuan pepper with cold water and let it sit for 15 minutes.
Strain the liquid and add sugar, lemon juice, and black salt. Stir well.
Serve over ice for a unique and refreshing experience.

Recipes.name: Pomegranate Mint Cooler
Recipes.overview: A fruity and minty cooler with the goodness of pomegranate.
instructions: Blend pomegranate seeds, mint leaves, and cold water until smooth.
Strain the mixture and add sugar and chaat masala. Mix well.
Serve over ice for a refreshing drink.

Recipes.name: Gundruk Ko Jhol
Recipes.overview: A traditional Nepalese fermented leaf soup for a unique experience.
instructions: Rinse gundruk thoroughly and soak in water for 30 minutes.
Heat mustard oil in a pan and add fenugreek seeds and dried red chilies.
Add soaked gundruk and water. Cook until the soup is flavorful.
Season with salt and serve hot.

Recipes.name: Chia Seed and Lemon Drink
Recipes.overview: A healthy and hydrating drink with chia seeds and lemon.
instructions: Soak chia seeds in cold water for at least 1 hour or overnight.
Add lemon juice and honey to the soaked chia seeds. Mix well.
Garnish with lemon slices and serve chilled.

Recipes.name: Jollof Rice
Recipes.overview: A flavorful one-pot rice dish with tomatoes, peppers, and spices.
instructions: Sauté onions in vegetable oil until translucent.
Add blended tomatoes, bell pepper, thyme, and curry powder. Cook until the oil separates.
Add washed rice, broth, salt, and pepper. Cook until rice is done.

Recipes.name: Bobotie
Recipes.overview: A savory baked dish with spiced minced meat and an egg-based topping.
ingredients: 2 slices white bread, soaked in milk
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Sauté onions, add minced meat, and cook until browned.
Mix in soaked bread, curry powder, coriander, jam, vinegar, and bay leaves.
Transfer to a baking dish. Beat eggs with milk and pour over the meat mixture.
Bake until the topping is set and golden brown.

Recipes.name: Chapati
Recipes.overview: Soft and layered unleavened flatbread, a staple in East African cuisine.
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour and salt. Add water gradually and knead to form a soft dough.
Divide the dough into small balls. Roll each ball into a thin disc.
Brush with oil and fold into layers. Cook on a hot griddle until golden brown.
Brush with butter or ghee before serving.

Recipes.name: Doro Wat
Recipes.overview: A spicy chicken stew, often considered Ethiopia's national dish.
instructions: In a pot, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in niter kibbeh until softened.
Add berbere spice and cook for a few minutes. Add chicken and brown.
Pour in chicken broth, cover, and simmer until the chicken is tender.
Add hard-boiled eggs and cook until the sauce thickens.

Recipes.name: Bunny Chow
Recipes.overview: Hollowed-out loaf filled with curry, a popular street food in South Africa.
instructions: Cut the loaf in half and hollow out the center, leaving a bread shell.
Fill the hollowed-out loaf with your choice of lamb or chicken curry.
Top with sliced onions and garnish with chopped cilantro. Serve warm.

Recipes.name: Maafe
Recipes.overview: A rich and peanut-based stew, popular in West African countries.
instructions: In a pot, brown meat in oil. Add onions and tomatoes, cooking until softened.
Stir in peanut butter, broth, sweet potatoes, and cayenne pepper.
Simmer until the sweet potatoes are tender. Season with salt and pepper.

Recipes.name: Couscous Salad
Recipes.overview: A light and refreshing salad made with couscous and Mediterranean flavors.
instructions: In a bowl, combine cooked couscous, cucumber, tomato, feta, and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Toss well to combine.
Garnish with fresh mint leaves and serve chilled.

Recipes.name: Nyama Choma
Recipes.overview: Grilled meat, a popular barbecue dish in East African countries.
ingredients: 1 kg beef or goat meat, cubed
instructions: In a bowl, mix vegetable oil, chopped onion, paprika, garlic powder, and grated ginger.
Add meat cubes and marinate for at least 2 hours.
Thread marinated meat onto skewers and grill until cooked. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with lemon wedges on the side.

Recipes.name: Briouat (North Africa):
Recipes.overview: Moroccan pastry filled with sweet or savory ingredients, often served during special occasions.
instructions: In a bowl, mix ground almonds, sugar, cinnamon, and orange blossom water.
Cut phyllo dough into squares. Brush with melted butter and place a spoonful of almond mixture in the center.
Fold into triangles, sealing the edges. Bake until golden brown.
Drizzle with honey and dust with powdered sugar before serving.

Recipes.name: Piri Piri Chicken (Southern Africa):
Recipes.overview: Grilled chicken marinated in a spicy Piri Piri sauce, originating from Mozambique.
instructions: In a bowl, mix Piri Piri sauce, olive oil, minced garlic, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Coat chicken pieces with the marinade and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Grill chicken until fully cooked, basting with the marinade. Serve with lemon wedges.

Recipes.name: Pad Thai (Thailand)
Recipes.overview: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and salty flavors.
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened. Drain and set aside.
In a wok, heat vegetable oil and stir-fry tofu until golden. Push to one side.
Pour beaten eggs into the wok, scramble, and mix with tofu.
Add soaked noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, and sugar. Stir-fry until well combined.
Add bean sprouts and crushed peanuts. Toss everything together. Serve with lime wedges.

Recipes.name: Sushi Rolls (Japan)
Recipes.overview: Delicious bite-sized rolls of vinegared rice, seaweed, and various fillings.
ingredients: Assorted fillings (avocado, cucumber, crab sticks, etc.)
Pickled ginger and wasabi for serving
instructions: Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi rolling mat.
Spread a thin layer of sushi rice over the nori, leaving a small border at the top.
Add your choice of fillings along the center of the rice.
Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat. Seal the edge with a little water.
Slice the roll into bite-sized pieces. Serve with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi.

Recipes.name: Chicken Adobo (Philippines)
Recipes.overview: A classic Filipino dish of chicken simmered in a savory and tangy soy sauce and vinegar marinade.
ingredients: 1 kg chicken, cut into serving pieces
instructions: In a pan, heat oil and sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
Add chicken and brown on all sides. Pour in soy sauce, vinegar, water, peppercorns, and bay leaves.
Simmer until chicken is tender and the sauce has thickened.
Serve hot over rice.

Recipes.name: Biryani (India)
Recipes.overview: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish with layers of spiced meat, often served with raita or curry.
ingredients: 500g chicken or lamb, cut into pieces
Fresh coriander and mint leaves for garnish
instructions: Marinate meat in yogurt, biryani masala, and salt for at least 1 hour.
In a pot, heat ghee and sauté onions until golden. Add tomatoes and marinated meat.
Layer soaked rice over the meat. Top with fried onions, coriander, and mint leaves.
Cover and cook on low heat until the rice is cooked and the meat is tender.
Serve hot, fluffing the rice gently.

Recipes.name: Kimchi Fried Rice (South Korea)
Recipes.overview: A quick and delicious fried rice dish made with kimchi and other flavorful ingredients.
instructions: In a pan, sauté pork or tofu until cooked. Add kimchi, carrot, and green onions.
Stir in chilled rice, soy sauce, sesame oil, and gochugaru. Cook until heated through.
Serve topped with a fried egg.

Recipes.name: Pho (Vietnam)
Recipes.overview: A Vietnamese noodle soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, and herbs, usually with beef or chicken.
ingredients: Fresh herbs (basil, mint, cilantro) for garnish
Bean sprouts and lime wedges for serving
instructions: In a pot, sauté onion until fragrant. Add star anise and cinnamon, cooking briefly.
Pour in broth and fish sauce. Bring to a simmer.
Divide cooked rice noodles and sliced meat into bowls. Pour hot broth over the top.
Serve with fresh herbs, bean sprouts, and lime wedges.

Recipes.name: Satay Skewers (Indonesia)
Recipes.overview: Grilled skewers of marinated meat served with a rich and flavorful peanut sauce.
ingredients: 500g chicken or beef, sliced into strips
instructions: Marinate meat in soy sauce, kecap manis, sesame oil, garlic, and turmeric powder for at least 2 hours.
Thread marinated meat onto soaked bamboo skewers.
Grill skewers until cooked. Serve with peanut sauce for dipping.

Recipes.name: Tom Yum Soup (Thailand)
Recipes.overview: A hot and sour Thai soup, usually with shrimp, mushrooms, and fragrant herbs.
instructions: In a pot, bring broth to a boil. Add lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, and galangal.
Add shrimp, fish sauce, lime juice, and sliced chilies. Simmer until shrimp is cooked.
Remove lemongrass and kaffir lime leaves. Serve hot, garnished with coriander leaves.

Recipes.name: Hainanese Chicken Rice (Singapore)
Recipes.overview: Poached chicken served with fragrant rice and a side of chili sauce and ginger paste.
ingredients: Ginger paste and chili sauce for serving
instructions: Rub chicken with salt and rinse. Poach in simmering water until cooked. Save the broth.
In a rice cooker, cook jasmine rice with chicken broth, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Serve chicken over the cooked rice. Serve with ginger paste and chili sauce on the side.

Recipes.name: Mango Sticky Rice (Thailand)
Recipes.overview: A delightful Thai dessert featuring sweet sticky rice topped with ripe mango slices.
instructions: Steam soaked glutinous rice until tender.
In a saucepan, heat coconut milk with sugar and salt until dissolved.
Pour the coconut mixture over the cooked rice and let it sit for 30 minutes.
Serve sticky rice topped with sliced mangoes. Garnish with sesame seeds.

Recipes.name: Classic Hamburger (United States)
Recipes.overview: An iconic American dish featuring a ground beef patty in a bun with various toppings.
ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles for toppings
instructions: Divide ground beef into patties, season with salt and pepper.
Grill or cook patties in a pan until desired doneness.
Place patties in hamburger buns and add desired toppings.
Serve with ketchup and mustard on the side.

Recipes.name: Macaroni and Cheese (United States)
Recipes.overview: A comforting dish with cooked macaroni pasta in a creamy cheese sauce.
instructions: Cook macaroni according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a saucepan, melt butter. Stir in flour until well combined.
Gradually whisk in milk until the mixture thickens. Add cheese, salt, and pepper.
Combine the cheese sauce with cooked macaroni. Top with bread crumbs if desired.

Recipes.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich (United States)
Recipes.overview: Slow-cooked and shredded pork shoulder with barbecue sauce, served in a bun.
instructions: Rub pork shoulder with paprika, brown sugar, salt, and pepper.
Place sliced onions and minced garlic in a slow cooker. Add the pork shoulder.
Pour barbecue sauce over the pork. Cook on low for 8 hours or until the pork is tender.
Shred the pork and serve in hamburger buns.

Recipes.name: New York Style Cheesecake (United States)
Recipes.overview: A rich and creamy baked cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C). Mix graham cracker crumbs with melted butter and press into the bottom of a springform pan.
In a large bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla until smooth. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Fold in sour cream. Pour the batter over the crust in the pan.
Bake for 60-70 minutes or until the center is set. Let it cool before refrigerating.

Recipes.name: Caesar Salad (United States)
Recipes.overview: A classic salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
ingredients: 1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces
instructions: In a large bowl, combine torn romaine lettuce, croutons, and grated parmesan cheese.
Add Caesar dressing and toss until well coated. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with lemon wedges on the side.

Recipes.name: Chili Con Carne (United States)
Recipes.overview: A hearty and spicy stew with ground beef, beans, tomatoes, and chili spices.
ingredients: 1 can (14 oz) kidney beans, drained and rinsed
instructions: In a large pot, brown ground beef. Add chopped onions and minced garlic.
Stir in diced tomatoes, kidney beans, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for at least 30 minutes. Serve hot.

Recipes.name: Southern Fried Chicken (United States)
Recipes.overview: Crispy and golden fried chicken with a seasoned coating.
instructions: Soak chicken pieces in buttermilk for at least 2 hours or overnight.
In a bowl, mix flour, paprika, garlic powder, and cayenne pepper.
Dredge chicken in the flour mixture, ensuring even coating.
Fry chicken in hot oil until golden brown and cooked through.

Recipes.name: Clam Chowder (United States)
Recipes.overview: A creamy soup with clams, potatoes, onions, and bacon.
instructions: In a pot, cook bacon until crisp. Add onions and celery, sauté until softened.
Stir in flour and cook for 1-2 minutes. Gradually whisk in milk.
Add diced potatoes and chopped clams. Simmer until potatoes are tender.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.

Recipes.name: Buffalo Wings (United States)
Recipes.overview: Crispy chicken wings coated in spicy buffalo sauce, served with blue cheese dressing.
ingredients: 2 lbs chicken wings, split at joints, tips discarded
Celery sticks and blue cheese dressing for serving
instructions: In a bowl, coat chicken wings with flour. Heat oil in a deep fryer or large pot.
Fry wings until golden brown and crispy. In a separate bowl, mix hot sauce and melted butter.
Toss fried wings in the buffalo sauce. Serve with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.

Recipes.name: Pecan Pie (United States)
Recipes.overview: A sweet and gooey pie filled with pecans, corn syrup, and sugar.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Place pie crust in a pie dish and crimp the edges.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, corn syrup, sugar, melted butter, vanilla extract, and salt.
Stir in pecan halves. Pour the mixture into the unbaked pie crust.
Bake for 50-60 minutes or until the center is set. Let it cool before serving.

featuredrecipes.name: Dhido
featuredrecipes.overview: A traditional Nepalese dish made from buckwheat or millet flour, usually served with various accompaniments.
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, gradually add water to the flour while continuously stirring to form a stiff and sticky dough.
Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Reduce the heat to a simmer.
Take a small portion of the dough and shape it into a round ball. Dip your fingers in water to prevent sticking.
Hold the dough ball over the pot and use your thumb to press the center, creating a hole. Rotate and repeat until a circular shape is formed.
Drop the shaped dough into the simmering water. Cook until it solidifies and floats to the surface.
Remove the cooked dhido from the water and let it cool slightly.
Serve dhido with various accompaniments such as Gundruk (fermented leafy greens), Achar (pickle), and perhaps some curry.

featuredrecipes.name: Dhido with Gundruk Curry
featuredrecipes.overview: A classic Nepalese Dhido recipe served with flavorful Gundruk curry.
instructions: Follow the basic Dhido preparation steps to make the dough and cook the dhido.
In a separate pan, heat vegetable oil. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter.
Add chopped onions and garlic. Sauté until onions are translucent.
Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric powder, salt, and pepper. Cook until tomatoes are soft.
Stir in gundruk and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Serve the Dhido with Gundruk Curry on the side.

featuredrecipes.name: Dhido with Chicken Curry
featuredrecipes.overview: Dhido served alongside a flavorful Nepalese chicken curry.
instructions: Prepare Dhido following the basic steps.
In a separate pot, heat vegetable oil. Add chopped onions, garlic, and ginger. Sauté until golden brown.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned. Add cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric, red chili powder, salt, and pepper.
Pour in the tomato puree and cook until the chicken is tender and the curry thickens.
Serve the Dhido with Chicken Curry, garnished with fresh coriander leaves.

featuredrecipes.name: Dal Bhat
featuredrecipes.overview: The staple dish of Nepal, featuring lentil soup (dal) served with rice (bhat) and various accompaniments.
instructions: Boil lentils in water until soft. In a separate pot, cook rice.
In a pan, heat ghee. Add cumin seeds, chopped onions, and minced garlic. Sauté until golden brown.
Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric powder, salt, and pepper. Cook until tomatoes are soft.
Mix the cooked lentils into the tomato mixture. Simmer until flavors meld.
Serve Dal Bhat with rice. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves.

featuredrecipes.name: Momos
featuredrecipes.overview: Delicious dumplings filled with spiced meat or vegetables, often served with a tangy dipping sauce.
ingredients: 1 cup ground meat (chicken, lamb, or buffalo) or vegetables
Soy sauce and vinegar for dipping
instructions: Mix flour with water to form a smooth dough. Roll the dough into small, thin circles.
In a bowl, mix ground meat or vegetables with chopped onions, minced garlic, grated ginger, cumin powder, coriander powder, turmeric, salt, and pepper.
Place a spoonful of the filling in the center of each dough circle. Fold and seal the edges to form dumplings.
Steam the momos until cooked. Optionally, pan-fry for a crispy texture.
Serve Momos hot with a dipping sauce made with soy sauce and vinegar.

featuredrecipes.name: Yomari
featuredrecipes.overview: A traditional Newari dessert, Yomari consists of steamed rice dumplings filled with sweet fillings like jaggery and sesame seeds.
instructions: Mix rice flour with water to form a smooth, thick batter.
In a separate bowl, mix grated jaggery, sesame seeds, grated coconut, and cardamom powder.
Shape the rice flour batter into small cups. Fill each cup with the sweet filling mixture.
Seal the cups and wrap them in banana leaves. Steam until the dumplings are cooked.
Serve Yomari as a traditional dessert.

featuredrecipes.name: Dhau
featuredrecipes.overview: Nepali yogurt, often served as a sweet treat with various toppings.
ingredients: Assorted fruits and nuts for topping
instructions: Boil the milk and let it cool until it's warm but not hot.
Mix plain yogurt into the warm milk as a starter culture. Cover and let it sit in a warm place for 6-8 hours until it thickens.
Sweeten the yogurt with sugar or honey to taste.
Serve Dhau chilled, topped with assorted fruits and nuts.

featuredrecipes.name: Sel Roti
featuredrecipes.overview: A traditional rice doughnut, crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, often enjoyed during festivals.
instructions: Soak rice and fenugreek seeds for a few hours. Blend into a smooth batter.
Mix rice flour, grated coconut, and baking soda into the batter. Add water to achieve a thick consistency.
Heat oil in a pan. Pour a ladle of batter into the hot oil to form a doughnut shape.
Fry until golden brown on both sides. Serve Sel Roti warm.

featuredrecipes.name: Gundruk
featuredrecipes.overview: A traditional fermented leafy greens dish, Gundruk is a staple in Nepali cuisine.
ingredients: 2 cups mustard greens or radish leaves
instructions: Clean and finely chop the mustard greens or radish leaves.
Add turmeric powder, fenugreek seeds, and salt. Mix well.
Pack the mixture tightly in a jar, ensuring there is no air inside. Add water to submerge the greens.
Leave the jar in a warm place for 3-4 days until the greens are fermented and have a distinct sour taste.
Gundruk is ready to be served as a side dish with rice or used in various recipes.
